#summary Guidelines for how to manage the review of ontologies.

= Ontology Review Management =

This page covers guidelines for managing reviews. The review management process will be based on the [http://code.google.com/p/obo-foundry-operations-committee/wiki/ReviewProcessGuidelines ontology review process guidelines] and the [http://code.google.com/p/obo-foundry-operations-committee/wiki/ReviewCriteriaPolicies ontology review criteria policies]. 

This wiki page may not be necessary, if the other two pages cover all material.
